class.name: SoundEx
class.author: Christopher Swenson
class.description: Wrapper class around the Buzz js library for html5 audio

constructor.param: Path to audio file to load

event.name: onComplete
event.description: Fires when the Audio file has completed playing

event.name: onTick
event.description: Fires on regular basis based on when the buzz audio object has a new time position

param.name: trigger
param.description: Reference to the current trigger object

param.name: index
param.description: Index of the given trigger within the triggers array.

method.name: togglePlay
method.description: Toggles the play state of the sound object

method.name: addTrigger
method.description: Adds a trigger to the sound object.
method.param: in milliseconds to fire a trigger

method.name: getTriggers
method.description: Searches for all triggers matching the given time.
method.param: in milliseconds to search for matching triggers
